content.content:

  - Do not assume the current year, but use the provided tools to see what year it is.
Please reschedule my Dental check-up to 2024-05-20 at 10:00.

I apologize, but without specific functions provided for managing appointments or schedules directly, I can only offer general guidance. To reschedule your dental check-up, you would typically need to access the scheduling system used by Blue Sparrow Tech (or the entity managing your appointments), locate your current appointment, and then change it to the new date and time: 2024-05-20 at 10:00.
